description: Sauris is situated in a slightly secluded location which adds to its appeal. Occupying a beautiful 17C house near a charming little lake and picturesque mountain village, this restaurant has been run by the same family since 1804. This enchanting setting acts as the backdrop for a menu featuring delicious regional specialities.
creditCards: ['Credit card / Debit card accepted', ' Mastercard credit card', ' Visa credit card']
